mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, account_, password_, phone_, sex_, user_name, avatar_, user_type, dept_id, company_id, locked_, enable_, remark_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by,wx_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update sys_user set account_ = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password_ = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_ = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex_ = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_ = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locked_ = #{locked,jdbcType=BIT}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wx_id = #{wxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, account_, password_, phone_, sex_, user_name, avatar_, user_type, dept_id, company_id, locked_, enable_, remark_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by,wx_id from sys_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, account_, password_, phone_, sex_, user_name, avatar_, user_type, dept_id, company_id, locked_, enable_, remark_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by,wx_id from sys_user

select id, account_, password_, phone_, sex_, user_name, avatar_, user_type, dept_id, company_id, locked_, enable_, remark_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by,wx_id from sys_user where account_=#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
